opennlp.ccg.realize
Class Realizer

java.lang.Object
  opennlp.ccg.realize.Realizer

public class Realizer
extends Object

The realizer manages the realization process. Realization options may be set for use across calls to the realizer.

Version:
$Revision: 1.31 $, $Date: 2011/07/19 03:40:46 $
Author:
Michael White

Field Detail

grammar

public final Grammar grammar
The grammar used for realization.

depthFirst

public boolean depthFirst
Flag for whether to use depth-first search. Defaults to false.

timeLimitMS

public int timeLimitMS
Time limit in ms. (Default is -1, or none.)

waitForCompleteEdge

public boolean waitForCompleteEdge
Flag for whether to wait for a complete edge. (Default is false.)

signScorer

public SignScorer signScorer
Sign scorer to use. (Default is none.)

pruningStrategy

public PruningStrategy pruningStrategy
Pruning strategy to use. (Default is none.)

hypertagger

public Hypertagger hypertagger
Hypertagger to use. (Default is none.)

Realizes the input LF relative to the given sign scorer, returning the best edge found (or null if none).

realize

public Edge realize(LF lf,
                    SignScorer signScorer,
                    int timeLimitMS,
                    boolean waitForCompleteEdge)
Realizes the input LF relative to given sign scorer, returning the best edge found (or null if none) in the given time limit (in ms), potentially waiting longer for a complete edge according to the given flag. If a hypertagger is employed, realization proceeds iteratively through the available beta-best values within the overall time or edge limit.
